title: How One School Avoided the Pandemic Plunge in Math Scores
description: Benjamin Franklin Elementary in Connecticut overhauled the way it taught â€” and the way it ran the classroom. Every minute counted.

media:description: Nationally, test scores have fallen in math even more than in reading. At Benjamin Franklin Elementary, children have defied the trend.
